sentences.en: ‘I have to go,’ she said, and with that (= after saying that ) she hung up the phone.
sentences.cn: “我得走了。”说完她就把电话挂了。

sentences.en: ‘We’ve been cheated,’ she said. Those were her exact words.
sentences.cn: “我们被骗了。”她说。这是她的原话。

sentences.en: ‘You never cared about me.’ ‘That’s not true.’
sentences.cn: “你从不关心我。”“那不是事实。”

sentences.en: a long shot, but she just might win at that.
sentences.cn: 长的射程，但她可能恰恰赢了

sentences.en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
sentences.cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

sentences.en: androcentric—that is to say, male-dominated—concepts.
sentences.cn: 以男子为中心的观念，即大男子主义思想。

sentences.en: Do you remember that nice Mr Hoskins who came to dinner?
sentences.cn: 你还记得那位来这儿吃过晚饭的好人霍斯金斯先生吗？

sentences.en: don't talk like that.
sentences.cn: 别那样说话。

sentences.en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentences.cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentences.en: Few would argue that this team has experience and proven ability.
sentences.cn: 这个队伍的丰富经验和表现出来的实力是众所公认的。

sentences.en: General Dunstaple had married Miss Hughes that was.
sentences.cn: 邓斯特普尔将军娶的就是原来的休斯小姐。

sentences.en: he can't just leave like that.
sentences.cn: 他不能那样说走就走。

sentences.en: He claimed that the businessman had conned him of £10,000.
sentences.cn: 他声称那个商人骗了他1万英镑。

sentences.en: He deliberated with them over that question.
sentences.cn: 他和他们商量了那个问题。

sentences.en: He killed a man once and that’s why he had to leave Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他曾杀死过一个人，这就是他不得不离开爱尔兰的原因。

sentences.en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentences.cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentences.en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentences.cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentences.en: He was a long-haired kid with freckles. Last time I saw him, that is.
sentences.cn: 他是个留着长发，脸上长着雀斑的孩子。我上次见他的时候是这样子的。

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I wish you wouldn’t say things like that.
sentences.cn: 我希望你不要那么说。

sentences.en: I’ve got that pain in my back again.
sentences.cn: 我的背又疼起来了。

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: it was not all that long ago.
sentences.cn: 是在不太久之前。

sentences.en: It's just a gimmick. That said, I'd love to do it.
sentences.cn: 那只是个小花招，即便如此，我愿意干。

sentences.en: It's just a gimmick. That said, I'd love to do it.
sentences.cn: 那只是个小花招，即便如此，我愿意干。

sentences.en: lived in one room, and a small room at that.
sentences.cn: 除了住一个房间，还有一个小房间

sentences.en: on the first floor, that is, the floor at street level.
sentences.cn: 在一楼，也就是说，和街道在同一层

sentences.en: other people depend on them for food and clothing and all that.
sentences.cn: 其他人指望着他们提供吃、穿及诸如此类的东西。

sentences.en: She was afraid in a way that was quite new to her.
sentences.cn: 她感到从未有过的害怕。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: The jury found that the NFL had violated antitrust laws.
sentences.cn: 陪审团裁决全国橄榄球联盟触犯了反垄断法。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: Victoria Street? That’s where my sister lives.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚街？我的姐姐就住在那儿。

sentences.en: We all know that fats spoil by becoming rancid.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道油脂变质后会发臭。

sentences.en: we need more people like that.
sentences.cn: 我们需要更多那样的人。

sentences.en: What did you do with those sandwiches?
sentences.cn: 那些三明治你怎么处理了？

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

phrases.tran_cn: 但是：不考虑已被说的或被暗示的
(非正式)毫无准备地；马上；不费力地
也就是说：更清楚地表达；换句话说
那就是，即，就是说，换句话说

trans.tran_en: used to say how big, how much etc, especially when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

trans.tran_cn: 多么，如此…以至，用于某些动词、形容词和名词后，引出各种从句
trans.tran_en: used after verbs, nouns, and adjectives to introduce a  clause  which shows what someone says or thinks, or states a fact or reason

trans.tran_cn: 〔用于动词、名词或形容词后引导一个从句，表示某人所说或所想，或陈述一个事实或理由〕
trans.tran_en: used after verbs, nouns, and adjectives to introduce a  clause  which shows what someone says or thinks, or states a fact or reason

trans.tran_cn: 那，那个〔指已经提到或已经知道的人、事物、想法等〕
trans.tran_en: used to refer to a person, thing, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used after a noun as a  relative pronoun  like ‘who’, ‘whom’, or ‘which’ to introduce a  clause
used to refer to a person, thing, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about
